description: Contributed to full-stack web applications using React.js and Supabase as part of an Agile development team. Actively participated in sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and code reviews while using tools like Figma, Microsoft Planner, and Teams to ensure smooth collaboration and timely delivery of scalable features.
Developed features for an ERP Admin Dashboard, optimized performance, and collaborated with teams to enhance user experience.
Completed a bootcamp and built full-stack applications using React.js, Node.js, and modern web technologies.
Technical coursework with problem-solving methodologies and process optimization.
Completed higher secondary education with a focus on science and analytical skills.
